name: @ilo-org/styles
description: Styles for products using ILO's Design System

scripts.build: sass scss:build/css --load-path=./node_modules && postcss build/css/index.css --base/css build/css --dir build/minified && postcss build/css/monorepo.css --base/css build/css --dir build/minified
scripts.minify: postcss build/css/index.css --base/css build/css --dir build/minified && postcss build/css/monorepo.css --base/css build/css --dir build/minified

author: @justintemps, @johnpauldavis, @avrilpearl, @ghlost
